title: OXO Flat Whisk
description: The Good Grips Whisks feature polished stainless steel wires and teardrop shaped handles that fit comfortably in the palm of your hand. The soft handle won't slip out of your hand, even when wet. Our Flat Whisk is particularly handy for deglazing a pan. Also available in 9", 11" and 11" Balloon versions, Good Grips Whisks are perfect for beating eggs, stirring batter, whipping cream and stirring sauces in comfort.

asset.title: OXO Flat Whisk

The Good Grips Whisks feature polished stainless steel wires and teardrop shaped handles that fit comfortably in the palm of your hand. The soft handle won't slip out of your hand, even when wet. Our Flat Whisk is particularly handy for deglazing a pan. Also available in 9", 11" and 11" Balloon versions, Good Grips Whisks are perfect for beating eggs, stirring batter, whipping cream and stirring sauces in comfort.
asset.author: OXO

transcripts: Whether you're whipping up a cream or beating some eggs, a whisk is a must have for every well equipped kitchen. The OXO flat whisk is also known as a sauce whisk. It has a soft comfortable bulb shaped handle that won't spin as your hand and the whisk flattens as you press down so that you can completely deglaze the pan. Here's a good tip, scrape off all the fond off your saute pan with your flat whisk. Fond is the caramelized brown bits built up from high heat cooking.
